channel.title: Need a web site for my clan
channel.description:
Ok so i'm gonna make a clan with my friend and we need a website. I already where to host and stuff, but the problem is we don't know how to make a good site (I mean a nice one). So if somebody could make one.. We could pay in rs cash.
PS It is a Runescape Clan.. PPS The name of the clan is Slayers of Death
TY, Teh Spede

item.title: Need a web site for my clan
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

ok well I solved this already with solemage so no worries, be happy =P

Read full topic
